data.event: There is an annual 3-day street fair held in July, known as the 'Sultan Shindig'.
Sultan was originally settled around 1880, but not officially incorporated until June 28, 1905.
Sultan was originally settled around 1880, but not officially incorporated until June 28, 1905.
In 1968, the town was visited by more than 20,000 hippies during The Sky River Rock Festival and Lighter Than Air Fair, one of the first outdoor rock festivals.
